Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") ContentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider")
Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera
Animations = {}
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if Mode == "PlayAnimation" and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = Value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(Value.FadeTime, Value.Weight, Value.Speed) elseif Mode == "StopAnimation" and Value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end elseif Mode == "Preload" and Value then ContentProvider:Preload(Value) elseif Mode == "PlaySound" and Value then Value:Play() elseif Mode == "StopSound" and Value then Value:Stop() elseif Mode == "MousePosition" then return PlayerMouse.Hit.p elseif Mode == "DisableJump" then DisableJump(Value) elseif Mode == "SetCamera" and Value then if Value.Subject and Value.Type then Camera.CameraSubject = Value.Subject Camera.CameraType = Value.Type end elseif Mode == "idk" then print(Value) end end)
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) pcall(function() local ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) return ServerReturn end) end
function DisableJump(Boolean) if PreventJump then PreventJump:disconnect() end if Boolean then PreventJump = Humanoid.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Jump" then Humanoid.Jump = false end end) end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end PlayerMouse = Player:GetMouse() Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = true}) end) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = false}) end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = false}) end) end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end if PreventJump then PreventJump:disconnect() end Animations = {} end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
BasePart = Instance.new("Part") BasePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BasePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic BasePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom BasePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) BasePart.CanCollide = true BasePart.Locked = true BasePart.Anchored = false
HotWheelsStreetHawk = Instance.new("Model") HotWheelsStreetHawk.Name = "HotWheelsStreetHawk"
HotWheelsStreetHawkBody = BasePart:Clone() HotWheelsStreetHawkBody.Name = "Body" HotWheelsStreetHawkBody.Size = Vector3.new(3.25, 1.5, 3)
BodyMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") BodyMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh BodyMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=183664928" BodyMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=183665022" BodyMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) BodyMesh.Parent = HotWheelsStreetHawkBody
HotWheelsStreetHawkWheel = BasePart:Clone() HotWheelsStreetHawkWheel.Name = "Wheel" HotWheelsStreetHawkWheel.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) WheelMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") WheelMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh WheelMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=183665009" WheelMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=183665022" WheelMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) WheelMesh.Parent = HotWheelsStreetHawkWheel
FrontLeftWheel = HotWheelsStreetHawkWheel:Clone() FrontLeftWheel.Name = "FrontLeftWheel" FrontLeftMotor = Instance.new("Motor6D") FrontLeftMotor.Name = "FrontLeftMotor" FrontLeftMotor.Part0 = FrontLeftWheel FrontLeftMotor.Part1 = HotWheelsStreetHawkBody FrontLeftMotor.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0) * CFrame.Angles(0, -(math.pi / 2), 0) FrontLeftMotor.C1 = CFrame.new(-0.9, -0.45, -0.885) * CFrame.Angles(0, -(math.pi / 2), 0) FrontLeftMotor.Parent = HotWheelsStreetHawkBody
FrontRightWheel = HotWheelsStreetHawkWheel:Clone() FrontRightWheel.Name = "FrontRightWheel" FrontRightMotor = Instance.new("Motor6D") FrontRightMotor.Name = "FrontRightMotor" FrontRightMotor.Part0 = FrontRightWheel FrontRightMotor.Part1 = HotWheelsStreetHawkBody FrontRightMotor.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0) * CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0) FrontRightMotor.C1 = CFrame.new(0.9, -0.45, -0.885) * CFrame.Angles(0, -(math.pi / 2), 0) FrontRightMotor.Parent = HotWheelsStreetHawkBody
BackLeftWheel = HotWheelsStreetHawkWheel:Clone() BackLeftWheel.Name = "BackLeftWheel" BackLeftMotor = Instance.new("Motor6D") BackLeftMotor.Name = "BackLeftMotor" BackLeftMotor.Part0 = BackLeftWheel BackLeftMotor.Part1 = HotWheelsStreetHawkBody BackLeftMotor.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0) * CFrame.Angles(0, -(math.pi / 2), 0) BackLeftMotor.C1 = CFrame.new(-0.9, -0.45, 1.14) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi, -(math.pi / 2), 0) BackLeftMotor.Parent = HotWheelsStreetHawkBody
BackRightWheel = HotWheelsStreetHawkWheel:Clone() BackRightWheel.Name = "BackRightWheel" BackRightMotor = Instance.new("Motor6D") BackRightMotor.Name = "BackRightMotor" BackRightMotor.Part0 = BackRightWheel BackRightMotor.Part1 = HotWheelsStreetHawkBody BackRightMotor.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0) * CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0) BackRightMotor.C1 = CFrame.new(0.9, -0.45, 1.14) * CFrame.Angles(0, -(math.pi / 2), 0) BackRightMotor.Parent = HotWheelsStreetHawkBody
for i, v in pairs({HotWheelsStreetHawkBody, FrontLeftWheel, FrontRightWheel, BackLeftWheel, BackRightWheel}) do v.Parent = HotWheelsStreetHawk end
return HotWheelsStreetHawk

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Remover = script:WaitForChild("Remover")
DisplayHandle = Tool:FindFirstChild("DisplayHandle") if DisplayHandle then DisplayHandle:Destroy() end
BasePart = Instance.new("Part") BasePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BasePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic BasePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom BasePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) BasePart.CanCollide = true BasePart.Locked = true BasePart.Anchored = false
Grips = { Equipped = CFrame.new(0, -0.75, 0, -1, 0, -8.10005167e-006, 0, 1, 0, 8.10005167e-006, 0, -1), Display = CFrame.new(3, 2.6500001, -2, 0.89442718, -0, 0.44721359, 0, 1, 0, -0.44721359, 0, 0.89442718), }
Animations = { }
Sounds = { }
Controls = { Forward = false, Backward = false, Left = false, Right = false }
Flying = false
Speed = 10
Gravity = 196.20
MovementTime = (1 / 30) ReloadTime = 5
HotWheelsStreetHawk = require(Tool:WaitForChild("VehicleCreator"))
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
Tool.Grip = Grips.Equipped Tool.Enabled = true
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if player == Player then if Mode == "MouseClick" then if not PlayerHotWheelsStreetHawk or not PlayerHotWheelsStreetHawk.Parent then if Value.Down then Activated() end else if Value.Down then Flying = true else Flying = false end end elseif Mode == "KeyPress" then local Key = Value.Key local ByteKey = string.byte(Key) local Down = Value.Down if Key == "w" or ByteKey == 17 then Controls.Forward = Down elseif Key == "s" or ByteKey == 18 then Controls.Backward = Down elseif Key == "a" or ByteKey == 20 then Controls.Left = Down elseif Key == "d" or ByteKey == 19 then Controls.Right = Down end end end end)
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ClientReturn = nil pcall(function() ClientReturn = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ClientReturn end
function GetTotalMass(Parent) local Mass = 0 local function GetMass(Parent) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then Mass = (Mass + v:GetMass()) end end end GetMass(Parent) return Mass end
function TransformModel(Objects, Center, NewCFrame, Recurse) Objects = ((type(Objects) ~= "table" and {Objects}) or Objects) for i, v in pairs(Objects) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then v.CFrame = NewCFrame:toWorldSpace(Center:toObjectSpace(v.CFrame)) end if Recurse then TransformModel(v:GetChildren(), Center, NewCFrame, true) end end end
function IsFlipped(Object) local Vector1 = Object.CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.FromNormalId(Enum.NormalId.Top)) local Vector2 = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) local Angle = math.acos(Vector1:Dot(Vector2)) return (Angle > 1.5) end
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled or not CheckIfAlive() or (PlayerHotWheelsStreetHawk and PlayerHotWheelsStreetHawk.Parent) then return end Tool.Enabled = false Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 local PlaneName = (Player.Name .."'s" .. HotWheelsStreetHawk.Name) local Plane = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindFirstChild(PlaneName) if Plane then Plane:Destroy() end PlayerHotWheelsStreetHawk = HotWheelsStreetHawk:Clone() PlayerHotWheelsStreetHawk.Name = PlaneName local RemoverClone = Remover:Clone() local CreatorValue = Instance.new("ObjectValue") CreatorValue.Name = "Creator" CreatorValue.Value = Player CreatorValue.Parent = RemoverClone local ToolValue = Instance.new("ObjectValue") ToolValue.Name = "Tool" ToolValue.Value = Tool ToolValue.Parent = RemoverClone RemoverClone.Disabled = false RemoverClone.Parent = PlayerHotWheelsStreetHawk PlaneBody = PlayerHotWheelsStreetHawk:FindFirstChild("Body") FrontLeftMotor = PlaneBody:FindFirstChild("FrontLeftMotor") FrontRightMotor = PlaneBody:FindFirstChild("FrontRightMotor") BackLeftMotor = PlaneBody:FindFirstChild("BackLeftMotor") BackRightMotor = PlaneBody:FindFirstChild("BackRightMotor") if PlaneBody then PlaneBody.Elasticity = 0.5 PlaneBody.Friction = 0.3 BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) TransformModel(PlayerHotWheelsStreetHawk, PlayerHotWheelsStreetHawk:GetModelCFrame(), (Handle.CFrame + Handle.CFrame.lookVector * (((Handle.Size.Z / 2) + (PlayerHotWheelsStreetHawk:GetModelSize().Z / 2) + 1.25) * -1)) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0), true) BodyGyro.cframe = PlaneBody.CFrame BodyGyro.Parent = PlaneBody BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.P = 1250 BodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyVelocity.Parent = PlaneBody BodyAngularVelocity = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") BodyAngularVelocity.P = 1250 BodyAngularVelocity.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyAngularVelocity.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyAngularVelocity.Parent = PlaneBody PlayerHotWheelsStreetHawk.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") Plane = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindFirstChild(PlaneName) if Plane then InvokeClient("SetCamera", {Subject = Plane, Type = Enum.CameraType.Track}) end Spawn(function() local Mass = (GetTotalMass(PlayerHotWheelsStreetHawk) * Gravity) while PlayerHotWheelsStreetHawk and PlayerHotWheelsStreetHawk.Parent do if not IsFlipped(PlaneBody) then if not Flying then BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) if Controls.Left or Controls.Right then BodyAngularVelocity.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, Mass, 0) BodyAngularVelocity.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, ((((Controls.Left and not Controls.Right) and 2) or ((Controls.Right and not Controls.Left) and -2)) or 0), 0) else BodyAngularVelocity.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyAngularVelocity.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) end if Controls.Forward or Controls.Backward then BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(Mass, (Mass / 2), Mass) BodyVelocity.velocity = ((((Controls.Backward and not Controls.Forward) and (PlaneBody.CFrame.lookVector * ((Speed / 2) * -1))) or ((Controls.Forward and not Controls.Backward) and (PlaneBody.CFrame.lookVector * Speed))) or Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)) else BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) end else local MouseTarget = InvokeClient("MousePosition", nil) local Direction = CFrame.new(PlaneBody.Position, MouseTarget) local Velocity = Direction.lookVector * 20 BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge) BodyGyro.cframe = Direction BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(Mass, Mass, Mass) BodyVelocity.velocity = Velocity PlaneBody.Velocity = Velocity end else BodyAngularVelocity.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyAngularVelocity.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) end local WheelSpeed = (25 * ((((Controls.Backward and not Controls.Forward) and 1) or ((Controls.Forward and not Controls.Backward) and -1)) or 0)) local DesiredAngle = (99999999999 * (-WheelSpeed / math.abs(WheelSpeed))) local MaxVelocity = (WheelSpeed / 250) for i, v in pairs({FrontLeftMotor, FrontRightMotor, BackLeftMotor, BackRightMotor}) do if v and v.Parent then v.DesiredAngle = DesiredAngle v.MaxVelocity = MaxVelocity end end wait(MovementTime) end end) end wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Player.Parent and Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0) end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end end
function Unequipped() if PlayerHotWheelsStreetHawk and PlayerHotWheelsStreetHawk.Parent then PlayerHotWheelsStreetHawk:Destroy() end if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then InvokeClient("SetCamera", {Subject = Humanoid, Type = Enum.CameraType.Custom}) Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end Flying = false for i, v in pairs(Controls) do Controls[i] = false end for i, v in pairs(Animations) do InvokeClient("StopAnimation", v) end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Model = script.Parent
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
FixCamera = script:WaitForChild("FixCamera")
Creator = script:FindFirstChild("Creator") Tool = script:FindFirstChild("Tool")
function DestroyModel() if Creator and Creator.Parent then local FixCameraClone = FixCamera:Clone() FixCameraClone.Disabled = false if Character and Character.Parent then FixCameraClone.Parent = Character else local Backpack = Creator:FindFirstChild("Backpack") if Backpack then FixCameraClone.Parent = Backpack end end end Debris:AddItem(Model, 2) end
if not Creator or not Creator.Value or not Creator.Value:IsA("Player") or not Creator.Value.Parent or not Tool or not Tool.Value or not Tool.Value.Parent then DestroyModel() return end
Creator = Creator.Value Tool = Tool.Value
Character = Creator.Character if not Character then DestroyModel() return end
Creator.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Creator.Parent then DestroyModel() end end)
Character.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Character.Parent then DestroyModel() end end)
Tool.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" then DestroyModel() end end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera
function DestroyScript() Debris:AddItem(script, 2) end
Camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom
Player = (((script.Parent:IsA("Model") and Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(script.Parent)) or (script.Parent:IsA("Backpack") and script.Parent.Parent)) or nil) if Player then Character = Player.Character if Character then Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if Humanoid then Camera.CameraSubject = Humanoid end end end
DestroyScript()
